General.Name: Smith Douglas Homes Corp.
General.Description: Smith Douglas Homes Corp., together with its subsidiaries, designs, constructs, and sale of single-family homes in the southeastern United States. It also provides closing, escrow, and title insurance services. The company sells its products to entry-level and empty-nest homebuyers. Smith Douglas Homes Corp. was founded in 2008 and is based in Woodstock, Georgia.
General.Address: 110 Village Trail, Woodstock, GA, United States, 30188

5.Name: Mr. James  Vankirk
